member.summary: Resets sequence, starting over.

member.summary: Runs through all given routines. It fails when they fail, it runs when they run, and it succeeds once all routines have finished.

member.summary: Routines to run in sequence.

member.summary: Routine that is currently run.

member.name: T:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi
member.summary: An IEnumerable based, state-machine/behavior-tree hybrid AI.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Heartbeat
member.summary: Makes the AI execute once.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.StartRoutine(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Starts given routine.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.ClearRoutine
member.summary: Stops the current routine and makes the AI start over.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.ExecuteOnce(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Routine is created and executed once.
member.remarks: This method can be used when a usually long-running routine is supposed to be started, but not waited for. For example, you might execute a movement routine, but not wait for the character to actually arrive at the destination.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Root
member.summary: Called to start routines when none are active.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.SwitchRandom(System.Int32)
member.summary: Imitates a switch-case that selects based on probability, instead of static values.
member.remarks:
SwitchRandom generates a random number between 0 and 99, which is then referenced by the Case method.
SwitchRandom only keeps track of one random number at a time. Switches can be nested, but randomly calling SwitchRandom in between will give unexpected results.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Case(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if the given value matches the probability generated by SwitchRandom, indicating that this case should be used.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Chance(System.Single)
member.summary: Returns true if the given percentage chance was met randomly.
member.example: Chance(100); // Returns true in 100% of cases. Chance(50); // Returns true in 50% of cases. Chance(25); // Returns true in 25% of cases.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Random(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number between 0 and max-1.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Random(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number between min and max-1.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.RandomValue``1(``0[])
member.summary: Return a random element from the given list.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Nothing
member.summary: Does nothing, an idle action.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Wait(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Waits between min and max milliseconds.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Wait(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Waits for the given amount of time.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Timeout(System.Int32,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Executes routine until it's done or the given amount of time has passed.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Ai.Enumerable.EnumerableAi.Timeout(System.TimeSpan,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Executes routine until it's done or the given amount of time has passed.
member.param: Time after which the routine returns.
